author: Andrew Loudon
description: Aniseed and clove delicately influence this complex riff on a classic Daiquiri.
name: José Marti Especial
recipeIngredient: 45 ml White/gold 1-3 year old mellow light rum
10 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: MUDDLE cloves with rum in base of shaker
Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
